description.narrative: Al 2024, los servicios locales y nacionales, las familias y adolescentes cuentan con capacidades para identificar, prevenir y responder a diversas formas de violencia y promover cambios de prÃ¡cticas culturales nocivas, which contributes to Access To Justice, Adolescent Empowerment, Hiv Prevention, Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Fostering Innovation And Use Of New Technologies, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: .
